page.title: 07LEISURE AND ENTERTAIMENT (c)
page.content: The local public houses have the games darts, dominoes, cards and pool played in them and outside some there are areas where children can be entertained. Swings, slides and tables with benches being made available. At the local club 'bingo'is played, also live entertainment is provided at weekends. At the Woeburn centre there is a Youth Club where discos take place. There is also a Nature Trail in the Vale which is a pleasant walk when the weather is fine. On Sundays there is an informal gathering of children with a religious bias in the church hall as opposed to a formal service.
